> Hi fellow junit addicts,
> a short question and easy one ?
> I have been using junit for a while now.
> Using 3.6 here, in a new place, some of my colleagues get a 
> "Could not create Failure Detail View, using default view" popup box when
> starting the junit.swingui.TestRunner
> 
> But some others (and myself) do not get the message box.
> The configs look the same ;-( very puzzling.
> Does not seem to affect the behaviour but maybe for overloaded failure
> class
> Any idea ?
